articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: As Backlash Against $10 Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Heats Up, Reggie Fils-Aimé Tweets the Story of Wii Sports Pack-in From IGN Interview — and Everyone Knows the Point He’s Trying to Make - IGN
articles.description: Former Nintendo of America boss Reggie Fils-Aimé has pointed to the story of Wii pack-in game Wii Sports in thinly-veiled tweets addressing the controversy surrounding Nintendo’s decision to charge for Switch 2 tutorial game Welcome Tour.
articles.content: Former Nintendo of America boss Reggie Fils-Aimé has pointed to the story of Wii pack-in game Wii Sports in thinly-veiled tweets addressing the controversy surrounding Nintendos decision to charge fo… [+5497 chars]

articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: 'Fire Nico!' chants abound in Luka Doncic's return to Dallas - ESPN
articles.description: "Fire Nico!" chants directed at the Mavericks general manager who traded away generational superstar Luka Doncic to the Lakers echoed throughout American Airlines Center on Wednesday night in Doncic's return to Dallas.
articles.content: DALLAS -- After only 4 seconds of action in Luka Doncic's return to Dallas, the first chant broke out requesting the immediate termination of Mavericks general manager Nico Harrison, the man responsi… [+3404 chars]
